text: used: mod_jk from Tomcat-src 3.2.1 compiled with AIX's xlc (v. 4.4.0) apache 1.3.12 also compiled with AIX's xlc AIX 4.3.3 patch level 6 Tomcat 4.2.1 (binary) used stock example servlets in webapps/example and added the lines to RequestInfoExample: println("QUERY_STRING:"); println(request.getQueryString()); recompiled and get the following results: called with: /examples/servlet/RequestInfoExample?test=junk produces: /servlet/RequestInfoExample for the querystring. Same platform returns expected results (test=junk) using Tomcat's HttpConnectionHandler without apache or mod_jk. Apologies if this is the same root cause as bug 107, but it didn't seem to match my experience.
creator: amcfarre@indiana.edu

text: This bug was seen using ajp13 (according to the bug author).
